name: Platman Worlds (C64)
description:
After his 16kb debut on the C64 (winning 3rd place in the 2015 RGCD 16kb cartridge competition) Platman is BACK on the C64! This time in a much bigger 64kb multipart adventure that spans four worlds!

Platman Worlds is also available from Psytronik Software in the following formats:-

Budget C64 disk - presented in a glossy disk sleeve with full colour label.

Premium+ C64 disk - presented in a clear case with full-colour double-sided inlay.

** PLATMAN WORLDS STORY **

In his debut game Platman was locked in a warehouse filled with tasty goodies guarded by ghoulish ghosts. And now he has returned in PLATMAN WORLDS and has four bigger worlds to explore: Classic World, Gothic World, Ancient World & Future World.

** PLATMAN WORLDS FEATURES **

• Specially enhanced 64kb version

• Four exciting worlds to explore

• 340 screens to munch your way through

• Themed Platman character for each world

• Gorgeously detailed hi-res graphics

• Cool 80's arcade inspired artwork

• PAL and NTSC compatible

** PLATMAN WORLDS CREDITS **

Programming by Andrea 'Wanax' Schincaglia

Graphics & music by Saul Cross

Inlay art rendered by Mat Recardo

Packaging by Jason 'Kenz' Mackenzie
